m_szDocTitle: Tesla Model X Reveal Scheduled For Sept 29, Invites Go Out | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Model X Reveal Scheduled For Sept 29, Invites Go Out September 21st, 2015 by Zachary Shahan   We’ve known since Sept 2 that the first Tesla Model X SUVs would be delivered to owners on September 29. Immediately, many of us started assuming an event for the revealing of the final vehicle would take place at that time as well. But then Signature reservation holders who were asked to configure but had not yet seen the vehicle asked Tesla personnel if there would be such an event on the 29th — and they were apparently told there would not be one. Either some Tesla staff were uninformed, some
